channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- All-in-One Video Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- All-in-One Video Gallery

item.title: CVE-2021-24970|2024-08-03T19:49:14.106Z -- unknown -- all-in-one%20video%20gallery
item.description: The All-in-One Video Gallery WordPress plugin before 2.5.0 does not sanitise and validate the tab parameter before using it in a require statement in the admin dashboard, leading to a Local File Inclusion issue
